name: Browser OS
description:
This is an Operating System that can be run directly from your internet browser, any browser from 2012 and above should be able to render this.

*The Password to get past the Lock Screen is the Up Arrow*

This is meant to be played on a screen with a 720p resolution, so you will have to zoom in to get the best experience (Sorry : / )

This is Still in development so if you have any suggestions please state them in the comments! : )

Disclaimers:

*This will never have any working online features, such as a web browser (it runs in a web browser  Lol)*

*THIS IS NOT A BOOTABLE ISO FILE, IT IS AND HTML FILE MEANT TO BE EXECUTED IN YOUR INTERNET BROWSER*
